definition: to vanish/to be nowhere to be found/unfounded (story)

sentences.english: Sun rushed to help her， only to find her clothes on the ground. She had disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 孫公子要去扶她，只見衣服在地上，人早沒影了。

sentences.english: The engineering is long gone in most PC companies.
sentences.chinese: 在那些電腦公司裏，工程學早就沒影兒了。

sentences.english: I didn't see it clearly before it totally disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 我還沒看清楚它就跑沒影了。
